text:
After filling out the application form, you'll need to submit several documents. This includes:
Proof of Income: Last 3 months of bank statements into which primary income is deposited into .
Identification: A valid form of ID such as a passport or driver's license.
The documentation needs to be in image format, cannot be in PDF form or Word Document. Please convert it into an image when uploading to our system.

options.text: Tell me more about the application form
